sentences.sContent: The sheer futility of it all exasperates her.
sentences.sCn: 它的完全无效使她很恼火。

remMethod.val: ex (非常) + asper (粗鲁) + ate → 非常粗鲁的行为激怒了他 → 激怒

words.tran: 恼怒；恶化；惹人恼怒的事
使恼怒；激怒；恶化（exasperate的过去式）

trans.tranOther: If someone or something exasperates you, they annoy you and make you feel frustrated or upset
